item.title: About
item.description: I’m Ahmed Shibani, a DevOps Engineer from Libya. After earning my Bachelor of Science degree in Electronics Engineering from University of Tripoli in 2006, I entered the information technology world to explore my passion for computers and technology.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is a fresh new blog built with Hugo and Ink theme in less than an hour! This is more random text
